title: Should i get Quinn or kog'maw
body: I'm really starting to enjoy ADC and now that both of these champs are on sale, i'm just wondering which i should get

replies.body: I really like playing Quinn more than Kog'Maw, but I see way more Kog'Maw due to his utility. Quinn's ult is super situational while Kog'Maw's is universally useful.
I almost forgot, the best part of playing Quinn is typing "Wheee I'm a bird!!!" in chat every time you ult.

I'd say Quinn over Kog right now. Kog is a really, really high risk champion right now. So if you plan on playing SoloQ with him it might be pretty difficult. Quinn can go top or mid right now. I don't think she is the best pick-up either but you can do more with her.

Do you enjoy playing with either of these champions specifically? If not, maybe wait for a different sale to get an ADC you're comfortable with.

Kog'Maw needs allied help for protection, he can become a hyper carry but only if he survives to late game. Quinn was fun to play during free week and has better roaming, and vision to hopefully escape beforehand vs AoE slow for Kog.

I doubt you are enjoying their specific skill set, but rather ADC in general (else you'd know which one to get). So then you should think why not wait for Jinx, Lucian, Caitlyn, Ezreal to go on sale. Jinx has no escape but great tower destruction and good range too. The other 3 all have some sort of dash skill to cross walls quickly.

I'd say Quinn because IronStylus.

But for real, though, Kog is much more of a risk as he's exceedingly slow with no escape mechanism. He needs a whole team to be built around him much in the same way as Yasuo. In #yoloqueue, you're not as likely to find that.

Quinn is free right now, so I would highly recommend trying her out before you buy her. She's awkward and not for every adc, certainly, but if you can perfect her, she is a lot of fun and definitely different from every other adc.

Kog'Maw is more typical "stand waaaay back and right-click to victory" but he will teach you the importance of positioning more so then almost any other adc.

Personally, {{champion:96}} would be my choice. As an adc his range steroid allows him to get free attacks on all but 2 enemy champions and it's also really good fun to play AP Kog'Maw to mix it up sometimes.
I just bought both and i'm really happy with the both of them!
ya i've got the RP for both but i want to have enough for another sale, because i always feel like if i buy alot in one sale i'll miss out on someone i want in the next sale
It all depends on what you want Kog is more for the poke with his abilities and quinn has better escapes so all depends on what your play style is
